text: City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan has issued regulatory order under Section 41 of the Tamil Nadu City Police Act, 1997 (Extended to the Cities of Salem, Tiruchi and Tirunelveli) for a period of 15 days commencing from midnight of March 28 to midnight of April 11. The order prohibits assemblies, meetings, processions, agitations, demonstrations etc., without prior permission.
title: Regulatory order issued
